canvas - Variable in class model.Ball

clearBalls() - Method in class model.BallModel
Remove sprite from dispatcher This method will be invoked by clearBalls() method in Controller to actually remove all balls from the screen.
clearBalls() - Method in interface view.IModelControlAdapter
Remove all balls from the screen.
color - Variable in class model.Ball
color of the ball
ColorStrategy - Class in model.strategy
Ball's strategy to change its color

combineStrategyFacs(IStrategyFac, IStrategyFac) - Method in class model.BallModel
Returns an IStrategyFac that can instantiate a MultiStrategy with the two strategies made by the two given IStrategyFac objects.
